Umicore has signed a long-term agreement with Terrafame Ltd for the supply of low carbon, sustainable high-grade nickel sulphate. High-quality nickel is a critical raw material for the production of cathode materials used in batteries for electric vehicles. With this strategic agreement, we secure access to this critical raw material and reconfirm our strong commitment to establish a sustainable battery materials value chain in Europe, creating sustainable value growth for our customers.
